pinyin: you3 qing2 ren2 zhong1 cheng2 juan4 shu3

definition: lit. in the eyes of a lover appears 西施[Xi1 shi1] (idiom); fig. beauty is in the eye of the beholder
pinyin: qing2 ren2 yan3 li3 chu1 Xi1 shi1

definition: In the eyes of the lover, a famous beauty (idiom). Beauty in the eye of the beholder
pinyin: qing2 ren2 yan3 li3 you3 Xi1 shi1

sentences.english: The annual traditional festival Mid-Autumn Festival, countless lovers and eventually became dependents places.
sentences.chinese: 每年的中秋傳統佳節，無數的有情人終成眷宿。

sentences.english: Because of you, I wanted to send flowers on Valentine.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你，我想在情人節送花。

sentences.english: Valentine's Day gifts available for sale at Praline.
sentences.chinese: 特製情人節精美禮物，精點坊有售。

sentences.english: These two who have true love marry and have the crystal of their love finally.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個有情人終成眷屬並且擁有了他們愛情的結晶。

sentences.english: He enfolded his lover in his arms.
Like young Long female although appearance if angel, actually icedcold sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 像小龍女般雖然貌若天仙，卻冷若冰霜的情人。

sentences.english: The Chinese Valentine's Day is on July 7th on the Lunar Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 中國情人節是農曆七月七日。

sentences.english: The warm sun, like the relationship between lovers.
sentences.chinese: 太陽暖暖的，像情人之間的關係。

sentences.english: Tara - an animal lover, she volunteers at a variety of local Animal Shelters.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個動物情人，她在當地許多的動物收容所服務。

sentences.english: There are so many adorable girl schnauzers here in the Lover Zone.
sentences.chinese: 在情人區有好多可愛的小雪妹妹。

sentences.english: A lover can never have enough of the solaces of his beloved.
sentences.chinese: 來自所愛之人的安慰再多，情人也不嫌。

sentences.english: Now he was charged with premeditated murdering, Steenkamp's shooting death valentine's day.
sentences.chinese: 現在皮斯托瑞斯被指控在情人節預謀槍殺斯廷坎普。

sentences.english: Love is a sweet tyranny, because the lover endures his torment willingly.
sentences.chinese: 愛情是甜蜜的虐政，情人心甘情願地受它的折磨。

sentences.english: How did you receive the Valentine's card?
sentences.chinese: 情人卡是怎樣到來的呢？

sentences.english: This was but the beginning of the tragedy of this pair of star-crossed lovers.
sentences.chinese: 這僅僅是這一對不幸的情人悲劇的開始。

definition: to carry on a clandestine love affair
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
